\Bigg]

llm_solution_answer:
\begin{aligned}
&\text{With }m(t)\approx m_0\text{ (since }m_0 \gg \rho A R\text{), the instantaneous circular motion satisfies }\\
&\qquad k\,R=\frac{\gamma m_0 v^2}{R},\quad \beta\equiv \frac{v}{c},\quad \gamma=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\beta^2}},\\
&\text{and the accretion drag gives } \dot R=-\frac{\rho A\,c\,\beta\,R}{2m_0}\Bigl(3-2\beta^2\Bigr).\\[4pt]
&\text{Eliminating }v,\gamma\text{ using the circular balance, one finds } \beta^2(R)=\frac{\alpha(R)}{\alpha(R)+\sqrt{\alpha(R)^2+4}},\quad
\alpha(R)=\frac{k R^2}{m_0 c^2}.\\[4pt]
&\text{Hence the time to shrink from }R_0\text{ to }R\text{ is the quadrature}\\
&\qquad t(R)=\frac{2m_0}{\rho A c}\int_{R}^{R_0}\frac{dR}{R\,\beta(R)\,\bigl(3-2\beta(R)^2\bigr)}.\\[6pt]
&\text{Two useful closed-form limits:}\\[2pt]
&\text{(i) Nonrelativistic }(\alpha\ll 1):\quad t_{\rm NR}(R)=\frac{2\,m_0^{3/2}}{3\,\rho A\,\sqrt{k}}\left(\frac{1}{R}-\frac{1}{R_0}\right).\\[4pt]
&\text{(ii) Ultra-relativistic }(\alpha\gg 1):\quad t_{\rm UR}(R)\simeq \frac{m_0\sqrt{2}}{\rho A c}\,\ln\!\left(\frac{R_0}{R}\right).
\end{aligned}
llm_solution_v1_answer:
\begin{aligned}
&\text{With }m(t)\approx m_0\text{ (since }m_0 \gg \rho A R\text{), the instantaneous circular motion satisfies }\\
&\qquad k\,R=\frac{\gamma m_0 v^2}{R},\quad \beta\equiv \frac{v}{c},\quad \gamma=\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-\beta^2}},\\
&\text{and the accretion drag gives } \dot R=-\frac{\rho A\,c\,\beta\,R}{2m_0}\Bigl(3-2\beta^2\Bigr).\\[4pt]
&\text{Eliminating }v,\gamma\text{ using the circular balance, one finds } \beta^2(R)=\frac{\alpha(R)}{\alpha(R)+\sqrt{\alpha(R)^2+4}},\quad
\alpha(R)=\frac{k R^2}{m_0 c^2}.\\[4pt]
&\text{Hence the time to shrink from }R_0\text{ to }R\text{ is the quadrature}\\
&\qquad t(R)=\frac{2m_0}{\rho A c}\int_{R}^{R_0}\frac{dR}{R\,\beta(R)\,\bigl(3-2\beta(R)^2\bigr)}.\\[6pt]
&\text{Two useful closed-form limits:}\\[2pt]
&\text{(i) Nonrelativistic }(\alpha\ll 1):\quad t_{\rm NR}(R)=\frac{2\,m_0^{3/2}}{3\,\rho A\,\sqrt{k}}\left(\frac{1}{R}-\frac{1}{R_0}\right).\\[4pt]
&\text{(ii) Ultra-relativistic }(\alpha\gg 1):\quad t_{\rm UR}(R)\simeq \frac{m_0\sqrt{2}}{\rho A c}\,\ln\!\left(\frac{R_0}{R}\right).
\end{aligned}

3\omega^2 - \frac{Ne q_0}{2\pi m H \varepsilon_0 r_0^2} \left( \frac{(2k m_N r_0^2 - 1)e^{m_N k r_0^2} + 1}{e^{m_N k R^2} - 1} - \frac{(2k m_e r_0^2 - 1)e^{m_e k r_0^2} + 1}{e^{m_e k R^2} - 1} \right) + \frac{k N V \omega^2}{\pi m H} \left( \frac{(2k m_N r_0^2 + 1)e^{m_N k r_0^2}}{e^{m_N k R^2} - 1} m_N^2 + \frac{(2k m_c r_0^2 + 1)e^{m_c k r_0^2}}{e^{m_c k R^2} - 1} m_c^2 \right)
